checks.name: OBM-Sync Database Definition Check
checks.description: Checks that the database contains the proper mappings between domains and obm-sync hosts.

checks.name: OBM-Sync Connection Check
checks.description: Checks that the obm-sync server(s) are up and running.

checks.name: OBM-Sync JVM Version Check
checks.description: Checks that obm-sync server(s) runs on the proper JVM version

checks.name: OBM-Sync Synchronization Check
checks.description: Checks that we can login and synchronize user's information on obm-sync server(s)
